LFX Linux Kernel Bug Fixing Fall

Sep 3, 2023

intro lfx mentorship

intro to kernel debugging and resources (+gdb)

introduce KASAN et al, syzkaller, mention dmitry

basic workflow

  • choose bug
  • reproduce
  • fix*
  • send patch *
  • checkout commit
  • copy config
  • patch tree
  • build
  • boot kernel with trixie.img
  • reproduce?
